name: Packing Green
description: Packing Green creates disposable tableware and food packaging made from plants. We offer a wide range of sustainable alternatives to traditional plastic disposable tableware. Help reducing the fossil fuel-based plastic use in HORECA and opt for our bio-based packaging collections. Packing Green creates disposable tableware and food packaging made from plants.
